title: automatic logon rejected (ldap)
body:
### expected behaviour
login with ldap backend

### actual behaviour
impossible to log in via ldap backend

### steps to reproduce
1. setup a ldap backend (i.e kolab)
2. try to access owncloud
3. take a look at the nice error :)

"automatischer login zurã¼ckgewiesen!
wenn du dein passwort nicht vor kurzem geã¤ndert hast, kã¶nnte dein account kompromittiert sein!
bitte ã¤ndere dein passwort, um deinen account wieder zu schã¼tzen."

"automatic logon rejected!
if you did not change your password recently, your account may be
compromised!
please change your password to secure your account again."


### server configuration
operating system: centos 6.5

web server: apache 2.2.15

database: mysql 5

php version: 5.3 

owncloud version: 6.0a stable

### client configuration
browser: ff

operating system: linux

### logs
#### web server error log
```
sorry, none
```

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
```
{"app":"user_ldap","message":"ldap error protocol error (2) after calling ldap_start_tls","level":0,"time":"december 17, 2013 00:35:49"}
{"app":"user_ldap","message":"ldap error protocol error (2) after calling ldap_errno","level":0,"time":"december 17, 2013 00:35:49"}

```
